AvailabilityZone.Description: Name of an availability zone to create instance

KeyName.Description: Name of an existing EC2 KeyPair to enable SSH access to the instance

InstanceSecurityGroup.Description: Name of an existing security group

VpcId.Description: VpcId of your existing Virtual Private Cloud (VPC)

Subnets.Description: The list of SubnetIds, for at least two Availability Zones in the region in your Virtual Private Cloud (VPC)
